Name: [Ally] Paperboo
Desc:
All squad members' DEF increases by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color>.
Active Skill: Uses a cardboard box to camouflage itself, inducing a taunt effect: While camouflaged, being attacked by enemies or reaching the camouflage time limit will trigger an explosion, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> in an area.
Desc2: Small but functional, it's a great help to Proxies in the Hollows.
